results.title: Board member questions about governance

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_DOCUMENT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Could you please upload any relevant governance documents that the board should review?
enhancedVariables.description: Upload any documents related to governance, such as bylaws or meeting minutes.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_GRANT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Do you have any grant documents that outline governance requirements or expectations?
enhancedVariables.description: Upload grant documents that may contain governance-related information.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_BUDGET
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Please provide the current budget document that reflects the organization's financial governance.
enhancedVariables.description: Upload the latest budget document for review.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_POLICY
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: What policies related to governance does your organization have? Please upload them here.
enhancedVariables.description: Upload any governance policies such as conflict of interest or board member responsibilities.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_PROCEDURE
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Can you upload any procedural documents that guide board operations?
enhancedVariables.description: Upload documents that outline procedures for board meetings or decision-making.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_HANDBOOK
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Is there a board handbook available? If so, please upload it.
enhancedVariables.description: Upload the board handbook that provides guidance to board members.

results.outputDescription: You will receive a structured overview of the governance documents submitted, along with any specific questions or clarifications needed.

results.title: Board member questions about governance
results.outputDescription: Generated content personalized for your organization

results.title: Board member questions about governance

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_DOCUMENT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Please upload your primary governing document(s) such as your Articles of Incorporation or current Bylaws that define the board’s authority and structure.
enhancedVariables.description: The organization's high-level governing document(s) that establish legal status, board composition, quorum rules, amendment process, and primary governance framework.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_POLICY
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Please upload key board and organizational policies (e.g., conflict of interest, whistleblower, records retention, gift acceptance) that guide board decisions and compliance.
enhancedVariables.description: Formal written policies which set standards for board conduct, ethics, financial controls, transparency, and legal compliance.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_PROCEDURE
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Upload any procedural documents or step-by-step guides the board uses (e.g., meeting procedures, nomination process, minutes templates, conflict resolution steps).
enhancedVariables.description: Operational procedures and workflows that translate policies into actionable steps for board officers, staff, and committee chairs.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_MANUAL
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Please upload any governance manuals or board handbooks that provide orientation, roles/responsibilities, committee charters, and governance best practices.
enhancedVariables.description: Comprehensive handbooks or manuals for board members that combine bylaws, policies, role descriptions, committee guidance, and onboarding materials.

results.outputDescription: The system will use the uploaded governing documents, policies, procedures, and manuals to provide tailored, governance-focused answers for board members — explaining roles, compliance obligations, meeting processes, and how the organization's bylaws and policies apply to common board questions.

results.title: Donor inquiries about programs and impact

enhancedVariables.name: DONOR_NAME
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: What name should we use to address the donor (individual or organization)?
enhancedVariables.description: Preferred salutation or name for personalizing responses to the donor.

enhancedVariables.name: SPECIFIC_ACHIEVEMENT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Which specific achievement or milestone would you like to highlight for the donor?
enhancedVariables.description: A concrete accomplishment tied to the program or impact the donor is asking about.
examples: Graduated 150 students from our literacy program in 2024
Completed construction of a clean-water well in Riverbend community
Launched a job-readiness apprenticeship for 75 young adults

enhancedVariables.name: MISSION_FOCUS
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: In one sentence, how do you describe your organization's core mission focus?
enhancedVariables.description: A concise mission statement to frame responses about programs and impact.
examples: We provide after-school STEM education to underserved youth.
We deliver emergency food and shelter to families in crisis.
We protect local wetlands and promote community stewardship.

enhancedVariables.name: CONTACT_INFORMATION
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Who should the donor contact for follow-up, and how can they reach them?
enhancedVariables.description: Primary contact details (name, email, phone) for donor follow-up or questions.
examples: Ava Martinez, Donor Relations Manager — ava@hopeworks.org, (555) 123-4567

enhancedVariables.name: PROGRAM_LOCATION
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Where is the program or activity taking place (city, region, or site)?
enhancedVariables.description: Specific geographic location(s) of the program referenced in the inquiry.
examples: Rural villages in Kasese District, Uganda
Our downtown transitional housing site — 240 Elm Street

enhancedVariables.name: DATE
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: If applicable, what date should we reference (event, report date, or milestone)?
enhancedVariables.description: Relevant date connected to the inquiry (use YYYY-MM-DD where possible).

enhancedVariables.name: TIME
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: If you need to schedule a call or meeting, what time(s) work best (include timezone)?
enhancedVariables.description: Preferred time for follow-up communications, including timezone.
examples: Weekdays between 9 AM and 12 PM ET

enhancedVariables.name: STAFF_NAME
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Which staff member should be named in the response (who will speak about the program)?
enhancedVariables.description: Full name of staff member quoted or listed as follow-up contact.

enhancedVariables.name: STAFF_TITLE
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: What is that staff member's title (for proper attribution)?
enhancedVariables.description: Official role/title of the staff member named (e.g., Program Director).

enhancedVariables.name: NUMBER
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: If you want to cite a numeric figure, what exact number should we include?
enhancedVariables.description: Any single numeric value relevant to impact (counts, participants served, units distributed).

enhancedVariables.name: PERCENTAGE
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: If using a percentage to show results, what percent should we report?
enhancedVariables.description: Percentage metric to communicate outcomes or change (enter as a whole number where possible).

enhancedVariables.name: KEY_OUTCOME_METRIC
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Which key outcome metric best reflects program success (and how would you describe it briefly)?
enhancedVariables.description: Primary measurable outcome used for impact reporting (e.g., graduation rate, employment rate).

enhancedVariables.name: BENEFICIARY_FIRST_NAME
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: If sharing a personal story, what is the beneficiary's first name we can use?
enhancedVariables.description: First name for a beneficiary quoted in communications (ensure consent is obtained).

enhancedVariables.name: BRIEF_TESTIMONIAL_QUOTE
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Please provide a short (1–2 sentence) testimonial quote from a beneficiary or partner.
enhancedVariables.description: A concise, attributed quote that humanizes impact (avoid sensitive details).
examples: 'Thanks to the job program, I found stable work and can support my family,' — Maria
'The tutoring helped my son read at grade level in six months,' — Parent of student

enhancedVariables.name: STRATEGIC_GOAL
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Which strategic goal does this program support (briefly state the goal)?
enhancedVariables.description: Organizational strategic objective linked to the program or activity.
examples: Increase youth graduation rates by 15% in target neighborhoods
Expand clean-water access to 10 additional villages
Reduce chronic homelessness in the county by 20%

enhancedVariables.name: TIMEFRAME
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: What timeframe applies to the achievement or plan (e.g., FY2024, Q1 2025, 2023–2026)?
enhancedVariables.description: Specific reporting or planning period relevant to the donor's inquiry.

enhancedVariables.name: SPECIFIC_PROGRAM_EXAMPLES
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Please list 1–3 specific program examples or activities you want us to reference.
enhancedVariables.description: Concrete program names or activities that illustrate how funding is used.
examples: Mobile health clinics offering vaccinations in West County
After-school robotics club at Lincoln Middle School
Micro-grant program for women entrepreneurs in Region A

enhancedVariables.name: FUNDRAISING_ROI
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: If available, what fundraising return-on-investment or cost-per-beneficiary figure should we share?
enhancedVariables.description: Financial efficiency metric showing fundraising impact (e.g., $1 invested yields $4 in services).
examples: Every $100 donated provides meals for 20 children

enhancedVariables.name: CHARITY_RATING
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Do you have an official charity rating you'd like us to reference (e.g., 4-star)?
enhancedVariables.description: Public rating label indicating organizational evaluation by a rating body.

enhancedVariables.name: RATING_ORGANIZATION
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Which organization provided that rating (if applicable)?
enhancedVariables.description: Name of the evaluator that issued the charity rating.

enhancedVariables.name: CFO_NAME
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: If the donor requests financial sign-off, which finance leader should be listed (name and title)?
enhancedVariables.description: Name and title of the organization's CFO or finance contact for financial questions.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_ATTACH
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Do you want to attach any documents to support this response? If yes, please upload below.
enhancedVariables.description: Placeholder to indicate whether supplemental documents will be provided; actual files uploaded in document fields below.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_DOCUMENT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Upload any general supporting documents (e.g., briefing notes or program summaries).
enhancedVariables.description: General file uploads to provide background material related to the inquiry.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_REPORT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Upload the full impact or evaluation report you'd like us to reference (if available).
enhancedVariables.description: Comprehensive program or evaluation reports to substantiate impact claims.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_BUDGET
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Please upload the program budget or budget summary you want to share with the donor.
enhancedVariables.description: Budget documents showing how funds are allocated for the program(s) in question.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_FINANCIAL_STATEMENT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Upload recent financial statements or audited accounts if the donor requests financial verification.
enhancedVariables.description: Organization-level financial statements or audited reports for transparency.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_ANNUAL_REPORT
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Upload your latest annual report to include in the donor response (if available).
enhancedVariables.description: Public annual report summarizing impact, leadership, and financials.

enhancedVariables.name: DOCUMENT_TESTIMONIAL
enhancedVariables.questionPrompt: Upload any signed testimonial releases or media consent forms for beneficiary quotes or photos.
enhancedVariables.description: Consent forms or signed releases permitting use of beneficiary testimonials or images.

results.outputDescription: A structured set of donor response inputs: personalized salutation, program/location details, key impact metrics and narratives, staff contact for follow-up, optional financial and credibility figures, and any supporting documents—ready for drafting a tailored donor reply about programs and impact.

results.title: Donor inquiries about programs and impact
results.outputDescription: Generated content personalized for your organization
